name: Jewel Match
synopsis: A classical Match 3 game! Jewel Match challenges you with 150 smart levels! Create rows of three identical diamonds quickly and cunningly to burst them on both screens. All gold tiles disappear until the level has been won. Break out powerful extras, use the hammer for difficult situations to smash the diamonds, or create a magic storm by puffing into the microphone! - 150 challenging levels across both screens - Three game modes: relaxed, play out and two-player hot seat - Great extras with microphone support
